profile.keyDisclaimer: ʻAʻole haʻalele kou kī pilikino i kēia mīkini. E hoʻolilo i kahi kope i pale ʻia e hoʻihoʻi ma kekahi mīkini ʻē aʻe.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Aia ʻoe ma Free—e hoʻohana i ka Lā/Mahina ma lalo. E hoʻougrade e wehe i nā kumuhana hou.

profile.moonTheme: E hoʻohana i ke kumuhana Mahina (ʻAumoe)
profile.backupTitle: Nā Kope Kākoʻo i hoʻopaʻa ʻia & Hoʻohui Lako
profile.openBackupTools: Wehe i nā Mea Hana Kope Kākoʻo
profile.backupDesc: Hana i nā kope kākoʻo i pale huaʻōlelo no kāu mau kī, a hoʻihoʻi ma kekahi mīkini ʻē aʻe e hoʻohui ai.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Pālupalu i nā leka ma ke ʻano paʻamau
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Pālupalu ke ʻole ka nānā i ka polokalamu
profile.notifyOnCopy: Hōʻike mai iā wau inā kope ʻia kaʻu leka
profile.loadFailed: Hāʻule ka hoʻouka ʻana i ka pilikino
profile.followHint: E ʻike ʻia kā lākou moʻolelo ma kāu hāmeʻa Hahai ke paʻi lākou me ka lehulehu ‘Followers’ (a i ʻole ‘Public’).
profile.userNotFound: ʻAʻole i loaʻa ka mea hoʻohana
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ua hewa kekahi mea i kēia ʻāpana.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Hoʻouna mua i ke kelepona a/i ʻole nā leka
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: E hoʻouna mua i nā kelepona a me nā leka komo i kāu kelepona a i ʻole īmela i hōʻoia ʻia. Hiki i nā kelepona/lekauila puka ke hōʻike i kāu helu Chatforia.
profile.enableTextForwarding: Hōʻā i ka hoʻouna mua leka

profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Hoʻouna i nā leka i ka leka uila
profile.enableCallForwarding: Hōʻā i ka hoʻouna mua kelepona

premium.description: Wehe i nā hiʻohiʻona mana a wehe i nā hoʻolaha.

auth.headline: Kamaʻilio palekana, honua me ka unuhi koke
auth.description: Palekana pau-ā-pau, unuhi i hoʻokele ʻia e ka AI, nā leka nalo, a me ke kelepona leo/wikiō.

feature.encryption: Palekana pau-ā-pau ma ke ʻano paʻamau
feature.disappearing: Nā leka nalo & nā hōʻoia heluhelu
feature.privacy: Pilikino mua. Kou ʻike, kou mana.

auth.keepSignedIn: E mālama iaʻu i loko mau
auth.desktopTip: Ma ka kamepiula? E kāmiko me kāu kelepona e kiʻi i ka polokalamu.

headlineAlt.highlight: e ʻōlelo ana i kou ʻōlelo

auth.subhead: Kamaʻilio pilikino, i hoʻopaʻa ʻia, a i unuhi ʻia — koke nō.
auth.tip: Hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻohana i ka Chatforia ma kekahi hāmeʻa — a i ʻole hoʻoili i ka polokalamu no ka ʻike ʻoi.
auth.scanHint: Kāmiko e hoʻoili i ka polokalamu a i ʻole wehe ma ka polokalamu kele pūnaewele.

footer.doNotSell: Mai kūʻai i koʻu ʻike pilikino

press.title: Nūpepa
press.contact: No nā nīnau pāpaho, kākau iā māua ma press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: No nā nīnau pāpaho, kākau iā press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: He mea hoʻomaopopo palekana ʻo Chatforia me ka unuhi koke a me ka palekana pau-ā-pau, i hoʻolālā ʻia no ka hoʻokaʻawale pilikino a maʻalahi hoʻi i nā kamaʻilio honua.
press.assetsText: Nā ʻologo, nā kiʻi pale, a me nā kiʻi huahana (e hiki mai ana).

careers.title: Nā hana
careers.intro: He hui liʻiliʻi mākou e kūkulu ana i kahi mea hoʻomaopopo pilikino, honua. Inā mālama ʻoe i ka palekana, ka hiki ke komo, a me ka UX leʻaleʻa, makemake mākou e lohe iā ʻoe.
careers.openRoles: Nā kūlana hāmama: ʻEnehana (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Huahana, Kākoʻo.
careers.apply: Pehea e noi ai: E leka uila i kāu resume/nā loulou i jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: E pili ana iā Chatforia
about.description: He mea hoʻomaopopo palekana, he ʻōlelo he nui ʻo Chatforia me ka palekana pau-ā-pau, ka unuhi koke, a me ke kelepona leo/wikiō. ʻO kā mākou pahuhopu: e kōkua i nā kānaka e hoʻopili—ma ka palekana, pilikino, a ma waena o nā ʻōlelo.
about.valuesTitle: Nā mea a mākou e hoʻohanohano ai

values.privacy: Pilikino mua: Palekana pau-ā-pau ma ke ʻano paʻamau.
values.access: Komo no nā mea a pau: Unuhi ʻakomi i 100+ ʻōlelo.
values.control: Mana: Nā leka nalo & nā hōʻoia heluhelu he koho.

about.howTitle: Pehea e hana ai ʻo Chatforia
about.howDescription: Hoʻopaʻa ʻia nā leka ma kou mīkini ma mua o ka hoʻouna ʻana. Hoʻolālā ʻia ka unuhi, nā kope kākoʻo, a me ka hoʻohui lako i ka hōʻemi ʻana i ka mea a kā mākou kikowaena hiki ke ʻike.

advertise.title: Hōʻolaha me Chatforia
advertise.description: E hiki i nā mea hoʻohana kamaʻilio koʻikoʻi me nā wahi nani a palekana i ka lama. Hāʻawi mākou i nā kahua hōʻike, nā kākoʻo, a me nā pāpaho hale. ʻAʻohe hoʻolaha no ka poʻe Premium.

adsense.withPubId: Ke lawelawe nei mākou i nā hoʻolaha ma o Google AdSense. Inā makemake ʻoe e kuhikuhi ma o Google Ads, e hoʻohana i ka ID mea paʻi {{pubId}} a noi i ka hoʻonohonoho i nā ʻāpana ma lalo nei. Loaʻa nā kākoʻo pololei—e hoʻohana i ka palapala.
adsense.noPubId: Ke lawelawe nei mākou i nā hoʻolaha ma o Google AdSense. Loaʻa pū nā kākoʻo pololei—e hoʻohana i ka palapala ma lalo nei.

advertise.noPlacements: ʻAʻohe hoʻonohonoho i kēia manawa. E hoʻohui i ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Ka pinepine komo kiʻekiʻe a me ka lōʻihi o ka noho i ka UI kamaʻilio
why.brandSafe: Nā ʻano palekana lama; ka helu palena pinepine i mahalo ʻia
why.sponsoredMoments: Nā “Sponsored moments” (laʻana, “Start a Chat” modal) i loaʻa
why.deals: Nā ʻaelike pololei a i ʻole ma o AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Mahalo! Ke hele mai nei kāu nīnau. E pane koke mākou.
form.missingRequired: E hoʻopihapiha i ka inoa, leka uila, a me ka leka.
form.mailtoInfo: Ke wehe nei i kāu polokalamu leka uila e hoʻouna i ka nīnau…
form.messageLabel: E haʻi mai i kou hoʻolaha

legal.disclaimerStart: Ma ka hoʻouna ʻana, ʻae ʻoe i kā mākou

upgrade.title: Hoʻougrade
upgrade.subtitle: Wehe i ka papahana kūpono: e ʻole nā hoʻolaha me Plus, a loaʻa nā hiʻohiʻona mana piha me Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: E pau ka hoʻohui
scheduleBanner.body: E hoʻi ʻoe i Free ma

features.noAds: Wehe i nā hoʻolaha a pau

features.plusAll: Nā mea a pau ma Plus
features.ringtones: Nā kani kelepona & kani leka i hoʻopilikino ʻia

features.allPremium: Nā mea a pau ma Premium
features.save25: Mālama ~25% ma mua o ka mahina
features.sameFeatures: Nā hiʻohiʻona like me ka Mahina

gettingStarted.title: E hoʻomaka ana
gettingStarted.subtitle: ʻŌlelo hou iā Chatforia? Hō‘ike pōkole kēia e hiki iā ʻoe ke lilo i mea hana i loko o kekahi mau minuke.

alert.text: E ulu ana kēia alakaʻi i ko mākou hoʻokō ʻana i nā hiʻohiʻona hou. Inā he mea i nalowale, e haʻi mai ma

section2.title: 2) E hoʻomaka i ke kamaʻilio
section2.item1: Hana i kahi DM a i ʻole Pūʻulu a hoʻouna i kāu leka mua.
section2.item2: E hoʻohana i ka unuhi koke e kamaʻilio ma nā ʻōlelo 100+.
section2.item3: E hoʻāʻo i nā leka nalo a me nā hōʻoia heluhelu ma Pilikino → Nā koho.

section3.title: 3) E hele i mua
section3.item1Part1: Hoʻokele i kāu papahana ma ka ʻaoʻao
section3.item2Part1: E hoʻohui i nā lako hou a hoʻonohonoho i nā kope kākoʻo i hoʻopaʻa ʻia ma

account.q: Pehea e hana ai a i ʻole e hoʻihoʻi ai i kaʻu moʻokāki?
account.a: Hoʻoiho i ka polokalamu a i ʻole e hoʻohana i ka pūnaewele, kaomi “Hana moʻokāki”, hōʻoia i kāu leka uila/kelepona. No ka hoʻihoʻi, e hoʻohana i “Poina i ka huaʻōlelo”.

privacy.q: He palekana pau-ā-pau anei nā leka?
privacy.a: ʻAe. Palekana pau-ā-pau nā leka a me nā kelepona ma ke ʻano paʻamau. ʻO ʻoe wale nō a me ka mea e loaʻa ka mea hiki ke heluhelu.

translate.q: Pehea e hana ai ka unuhi koke?
translate.a: E hoʻohui i “Unuhi-ʻakomi” ma Nā Hoʻonā → Hiʻona & ʻŌlelo. Hana mākou ma ka mīkini ke kākoʻo ʻia, a i ʻole ma o nā API palekana me ka ʻike liʻiliʻi loa.

contact.a: Kākau iā mākou ma support@chatforia.com. E hoʻopili nā kiʻi ʻoniʻoni a me kou mana polokalamu.

contact.title: Kāhea mai iā mākou
contact.successMsg: Mahalo—e pane mākou ma ka leka uila.
contact.errorSend: ʻAʻole hiki ke hoʻouna. E leka iā support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Wehewehe kēia Kulekele Pilikino i ke ala e hōʻiliʻili, hoʻohana, a kaʻana ai ʻo Chatforia (“mākou”) i ka ʻike ke hoʻohana ʻoe i kā mākou mau polokalamu a me nā lawelawe. Hoʻolālā mākou iā Chatforia e hōʻemi i ka ʻike hiki iā mākou ke ʻike.

infoWeCollect.title: Ka ʻike a mākou e hōʻiliʻili ai
infoWeCollect.account: ʻIke moʻokāki (laʻana, leka uila/kelepona) e hana a e palekana i kāu moʻokāki.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: ʻIke i hoʻopaʻa ʻia (nā leka/kelepona) he palekana pau-ā-pau; ʻaʻole mākou e heluhelu.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Kūkākūkā/kūkulu e like me nā moʻopuna haki, ʻano lako, a i ʻole ka loiloi maʻalahi no ka hoʻomaikaʻi ʻana i ka hana.

howWeUse.title: Pehea mākou e hoʻohana ai
howWeUse.provide: Hāʻawi a palekana i ka lawelawe (komo, ʻike spam/ʻino).
howWeUse.improve: Hoʻomaikaʻi i nā hiʻohiʻona (kūlana unuhi, paʻa).

sharing.title: Kaʻana ʻana
sharing.body: ʻAʻole mākou e kūʻai i ka ʻike pilikino. Hiki ke kaʻana iki ʻia me nā mea hana (laʻana, hoʻoāla pū, loiloi) ma lalo o nā ʻaelike paʻa.

rights.title: Kou kuleana
rights.body: E like me kou ʻāina (laʻana, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), hiki iā ʻoe ke noi i ke komo, ka hoʻoponopono, ka holoi, a i ʻole ke koho i waho o kekahi hana. Kāhea: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Mālama ʻike & palekana
retention.body: Mālama wale mākou i ka mea e pono ai no ka lawelawe, a hoʻohana i ka palekana maʻamau o ka ʻoihana. ʻAʻole hiki iā mākou ke unuhi i ka ʻike pau-ā-pau.

children.title: Nā keiki
children.body: ʻAʻole no nā keiki ma lalo o 13 makahiki ʻo Chatforia (a i ʻole e like me ke kānāwai kūloko).

changes.title: Loli
changes.body: E kau mākou i nā hoʻouka ma ʻaneʻi a hoʻololi i ka “Hoʻohou hope loa”.

intro.body: Ma ka hoʻohana ʻana i Chatforia ʻoe e ʻae i kēia mau Kumu. Inā ʻaʻole ʻoe e ʻae, mai hoʻohana i ka lawelawe.

accounts.title: Nā moʻokāki
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: E hāʻawi i ka ʻike pololei a mālama i nā kikokikona palekana.
accounts.itemResponsibility: No kāu hana ma kāu moʻokāki kāu kuleana.

acceptableUse.title: Hoʻohana ʻae ʻia
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: ʻAʻohe ʻike kānāwai ʻole, ʻino, a kīpī; ʻaʻohe spam a i ʻole hana ʻakomi ʻino.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Hiki iā mākou ke kaomi/kāpae no nā kipi.

yourContent.title: Kou ʻike
yourContent.body: Noū nō nā kuleana ma kou ʻike. Hāʻawi ʻoe i nā kuleana e pono ai no ka lawelawe (laʻana, ala, mālama, unuhi).

disclaimer.title: Hōʻole & kuleana
disclaimer.body: Hāʻawi ʻia ka lawelawe “me ia” me ka ʻole o nā hōʻoia. I ka palena nui loa i ʻae ʻia e ke kānāwai, ʻaʻole kuleana ʻo Chatforia no nā poino kūʻē a nui hoʻi.

changes.title: Nā loli
changes.body: Hiki iā mākou ke hoʻouka i kēia mau kumu; ʻo ka hoʻomau ʻana ma hope o nā loli he ʻae ia.

doNotSell.title: Mai kūʻai a kaʻana aku i kaʻu ʻike pilikino
doNotSell.body: ʻAʻole kūʻai ʻo Chatforia i ka ʻike pilikino. Hiki nō i nā kamaʻāina o Kaleponi ke hoʻouna i nā noi ma lalo o CPRA me ke pihi ma lalo nei.

cookies.title: Nā Hoʻonohonoho Kukī
cookies.body: Hoʻohana ʻo Chatforia i nā kukī liʻiliʻi (laʻana, hālāwai, palekana). ʻAʻole mākou e hoʻohana i nā kukī hoʻolaha ʻaoʻao ʻekolu. Hoʻokele i nā kukī ma o nā hoʻonā o kāu polokalamu kele pūnaewele.
